trans-unit.source: Establishes an inline editor for the updating of property values.
This class can hold a single <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>: one for an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode> editor.
Inline editing refers to the entering of property values into a text box or similar control as opposed to setting the value by choosing it from a drop-down menu.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> class.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> class as the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.InlineEditorTemplate*>.
The inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used to create the new property value editor.

Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> to designate that a particular <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> be used to change a property value.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.

Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> to designate that a particular <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type be used to change a property value.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> for the designated <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type.
Gets or sets the InlineEditorTemplate, the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used for an inline editor.
This <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> has its <xref:System.Windows.DataContext> set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that represents an inline editor.
